title: anbu sheidiDum
sahitya:
anbu sheidiDum inbam aruLvAi Ananda shivanE agha nAyakanE


anupallavi

  vambu pEship-pEshi vAyai vIsi vIsi vanda vAzhvai vINE sindi nondiDAmal


caraNam    varambilAda turiya sorUpa vAnilE vAik-kOTTai kaTTi vasikkalAghumO
arum pasiyum nAvAl annam enrAl pOmO ArAindaDangi aghamukhamAgi
